unnormalised: **New Wheels on the Road: Desi Auto Buzz!**
normalised: new wheels on the road desi auto buzz

unnormalised: Guess what, folks? The Indian auto scene is hotter than a Chennai summer! Dr. Reddy's Auto just unveiled their new electric rickshaw, the 'Bijli Bullet,' promising a whopping 150 km range. Perfect for those chaotic Delhi roads, right?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki quietly launched a new variant of the Alto 800, the 'Dream Edition,' aimed squarely at first-time buyers. With prices starting at Rs. 3.5 lakh, it's definitely a steal. Diwali bonus, anyone? Time to upgrade that old scooter!
